original_text: And all the peoples of the earth shall see that you are called by the name of the Lord, and they shall be afraid of you.
korean_text: 땅의 모든 백성이 여호와의 이름이 너를 위하여 불리는 것을 보고 너를 두려워하리라

sentences.original_text: And all the peoples of the earth shall see
that you are called by the name of the Lord
and they shall be afraid of you.
